description: This course aims to introduce you to the world of using games for learning. Games are usually associated with entertainment but “serious games” are designed with a specific intent and purpose. You will learn about the principles of designing games and be able to evaluate the use of serious games for learning and patient care.
title: Serious games: Applications in healthcare
prerequisite: Principles of Learning and Teaching in the Professions and Principles and Applications of TEL or Completion of other relevant modules in the past 5 years can be considered on a case by case basis
